title: Owner of My Heart
description: When his children are taken away from him without living at all, Merin is at the end of his rope and still has to save Rin from the clutches of sorrow. But not even in his grief can he find peace, because the attacker is plotting and his newly united kingdom must prepare for war against a vicious invading army.Will working together save the kingdom--and their family--from giving in to the continuing challenges? Can love truly conquer all or will their enemies finally achieve victory?CONTENT ADVISORY: This title includes HFN ending.
author: Valentina Heart
